text:
**Chakra** is a user-friendly and powerful distribution forked from Arch Linux. With an emphasis on KDE and Qt technologies, as well as a half-rolling release model, Chakra strives to provide the best of rolling stability.
**Notable features**
- Based on Arch Linux for the latest packages.
- Custom KDE theme OOTB.
**Available DEs**
- KDE Plasma
**More info**
https://chakralinux.org/
